subject: getting a box
author: bhali333
full_text:
hi, 
is there anyone that can help me get or have made one of franks boxes ? 
I am a serious evp researcher and paranormal investigator.
also I am a disabled 911 rescue worker with alot of time for 
experimentation, so if anyone can help with a box or turn me on to 
someone who can build one for me please let me know.

bruce
